subject: Philosophy
title: Amor Fati: Love Your Fate
description: One-minute skill: Amor Fati: Love Your Fate.

hook.text: What if you didn't just endure hardship, but actually embraced it?

buildup.text: Amor fati means loving your fate â€” accepting everything that happens as necessary and even welcome.

discovery.text: Marcus Aurelius wrote that a blazing fire turns everything thrown into it into fuel.

twist.text: This doesn't mean being passive. It means using obstacles as raw material for growth.

climax.text: Nietzsche later adopted the concept: the highest form of affirmation is wanting your life repeated infinitely.

punchline.text: Don't just accept fate. Love it.
